医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
绘制人类生物学图谱：人类细胞图谱引领精准医学新时代人类细胞图谱项目绘制人类细胞图谱，以了解生物学、解决全球健康差异，并通过道德和包容性的研究实践推进个性化医疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Mapping- human-biology-Human-Cell-Atlas-leads-a-new-era-in- precision-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Mapping- human-biology-Human-Cell-Atlas-leads-a-new-era-in- precision-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4db15852-671b-4f36-b525-78e706d0f69c Thu, 21 Nov 2024 23:56:00 -0500 Mapping human biology: Human Cell Atlas leads a new era in precision medicine
SCimilarity 通过快速跨组织比较彻底改变了单细胞数据分析研究人员开发了 SCimilarity，这是一种突破性的度量学习框架，用于快速分析和比较跨组织、疾病和实验条件的单细胞数据。该工具可以扩展地发现整个人类细胞图谱中共享的细胞状态和生物学见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/SCimilarity-revolutionizes-single-cell-data-analysis-with-rapid-cross-tissue-comparisons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/SCimilarity-revolutionizes-single-cell-data-analysis-with-rapid-cross-tissue-comparisons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79310d81-820a-4545-be72-f1d1c16a9798 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 23:31:00 -0500 SCimilarity revolutionizes single-cell data analysis with rapid cross-tissue comparisons
AI 模型重新定义乳腺癌 TIL 评分，但在现实世界验证中面临挑战分析肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞的人工智能模型有望预测三阴性乳腺癌的结果，但外部验证揭示了关键的性能差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/AI-models-redefine-TIL-scoring-in-breast-cancer-but-face-challenges-in-real-world-validation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/AI-models-redefine-TIL-scoring-in-breast-cancer-but-face-challenges-in-real-world-validation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b98fb00-8441-425c-a957-e909e7996df2 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 23:02:00 -0500 AI models redefine TIL scoring in breast cancer but face challenges in real-world validation
三倍效率：一个顶置搅拌器和 3 个温控筛选反应Asynt 宣布实验室最受欢迎的 DrySyn 涡旋平行顶置搅拌系统现已推出具有主动温度控制功能的产品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Triple-your-efficiency-one-overhead-stirrer-3-x-温度-受控-筛选-reactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Triple-your-efficiency-one-overhead-stirrer-3-x-Temperature-driven-screening-reactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e799dc7-25ee-437f-b64f-10dab3ca0a9c Thu, 21 Nov 2024 22:51:00 -0500
BiomedParse 以突破性的精度和可扩展性改变生物医学图像分析BiomedParse 是一种革命性的生物医学模型，它统一了九种模式的图像分割、检测和识别，其性能优于传统方法，并能够对复杂的生物医学图像进行可扩展、精确的分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/BiomedParse-transforms-biomedical-image-analysis-with-groundwriting- precision-and-scalability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/BiomedParse-transforms-biomedical-image-analysis-with-groundwriting- precision-and-scalability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bb9917d-e2b2-4621-b693-7244bfc43ecd Thu, 21 Nov 2024 22:44:00 -0500 BiomedParse transforms biomedical image analysis with groundbreaking precision and scalability
新的神经影像标记物可能会在未来的临床试验中识别出有痴呆风险的人一项具有里程碑意义的研究发现，一种新的脑小血管疾病神经影像标记物与一般认知有关，可能有助于在未来的临床试验中识别有痴呆风险的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/New-neuroimaging-marker-may-identify-persons-at-risk-of-dementia-in-future-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/New-neuroimaging-marker-may-identify-persons-at-risk-of-dementia-in-future-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b9c6221-1c51-4682-8f90-6a738d5e63c8 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 20:02:46 -0500 New neuroimaging marker may identify persons at risk of dementia in future clinical trials
研究表明启动心脏自身修复机制的关键严重心力衰竭后，心脏通过形成新细胞进行愈合的能力非常低。然而，在接受支持性心脏泵治疗后，受损心脏利用新肌肉细胞进行自我修复的能力显着提高，甚至高于健康心脏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-suggests-a-key-to-kick-start-the-hearts-own-repair-mechanism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-suggests-a-key-to-kick-start-the-hearts-own-repair-mechanism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79e48322-ff56-4928-a993-05afc7f52ef8 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 19:54:31 -0500 Study suggests a key to kick-start the heart's own repair mechanism
利用睡眠数据预测情绪发作：心理健康护理的突破研究人员开发了一种机器学习模型，仅使用睡眠-觉醒模式来预测情绪障碍患者的情绪发作，达到了很高的准确性。这种方法利用可穿戴设备或智能手机的数据简化了现实世界的心理健康监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Predicting-mood-episodes-with-sleep-data-A-breakthrough-for-mental-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Predicting-mood-episodes-with-sleep-data-A-breakthrough-for-mental-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca932d44-3644-4524-8bf2-d7263b2e2935 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 19:48:00 -0500 Predicting mood episodes with sleep data: A breakthrough for mental health care
UVA 研究人员发现血压药物如何影响肾脏弗吉尼亚大学医学院的研究人员发现，长期使用常用药物治疗高血压会破坏肾脏过滤和净化血液的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/UVA-researchers-discover-how-blood-Pressure-medications-affect-kidneys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/UVA-researchers-discover-how-blood-Pressure-medications-affect-kidneys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbc6a96d-13df-4275-81c9-1d5a0d2edc1e Thu, 21 Nov 2024 19:43:58 -0500 UVA researchers discover how blood pressure medications affect kidneys
纽约大学朗格健康中心进行世界首例全机器人双肺移植手术纽约大学朗格健康中心的外科团队完成了世界上首例全机器人双肺移植手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Worlde28099s-first-filled-robotic-double-lung-transplant-performed-at-NYU-Langone-Health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Worlde28099s-first-filled-robotic-double-lung-transplant-performed-at-NYU-Langone-Health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22ba60af-9fb2-4bfb-a747-ff3c6cbb1781 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 19:25:50 -0500 World’s first fully robotic double lung transplant performed at NYU Langone Health
